articles.description: Aston Villa striker Ollie Watkins says he waited weeks for his chance - and he took it with a late winner to send England to the Euro 2024 final.
articles.title: Ollie Watkins: Aston Villa striker takes his chance for England

articles.description: Gareth Southgate has been pelted with beer cups and criticism but now stands on the verge of history with his England team, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Netherlands 1-2 England: Gareth Southgate on the brink of Euro 2024 final history

articles.description: Gareth Southgate says England have "given supporters some of the best nights in 50 years" after booking their place in a successive Euros final.
articles.title: Gareth Southgate proud as England book place in a successive European Championship final.

articles.description: Netherlands boss Ronald Koeman criticises the use of video assistant referees for "breaking football" after England were awarded a contentious penalty in their Euro 2024 semi-final on Tuesday.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Netherlands boss Ronald Koeman accuses VAR of 'breaking football' in defeat to England

articles.description: England will face Spain in Sunday's Euro 2024 final in Berlin in a game you can watch live on the BBC.
articles.title: England to face Spain in Euro 2024 final on Sunday live on BBC

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Netherlands vs England in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: England vs Netherlands: Euro 2024 semi-final preview, stats, team news, head-to-head

articles.description: The USA sack head coach Gregg Berhalter following their Copa America group-stage exit.
articles.title: USA sack Gregg Berhalter after early Copa America exit

articles.description: Four players remain in the Wimbledon women's singles draw, but can anyone stop overwhelming favourite Elena Rybakina?
articles.title: Wimbledon women's semi-finals preview: Elena Rybakina the gold standard

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate says his players' "dedication to each other" has allowed them to make it to the final of Euro 2024, after beating the Netherlands in the semi-finals.
articles.title: Euro 2024 video: Netherlands 1-2 England - Gareth Southgate 'so pleased' with England performance

articles.description: England striker Ollie Watkins is delighted after scoring the winner in the 90th minute against the Netherlands to send them into the Euro 2024 final.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Netherlands 1-2 England - Ollie Watkins describes feeling of scoring late winner
